products.name: iPhone 15 Pro
products.shortDescription: Latest iPhone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, and advanced camera system
products.fullDescription: The iPhone 15 Pro represents the pinnacle of smartphone technology. Crafted from aerospace-grade titanium, it's lighter and more durable than ever. The A17 Pro chip delivers unprecedented performance, making even the most demanding tasks effortless. With ProMotion technology, Always-On display, and Dynamic Island, your experience is smooth and intuitive.

specifications.Display: 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion
specifications.Colors: Natural Titanium, Blue Titanium, White Titanium, Black Titanium

products.name: Samsung Galaxy S4 Ultra
products.fullDescription: The Galaxy S24 Ultra pushes the boundaries of what a smartphone can do. With its built-in S Pen, you can write, draw, and navigate with precision. The 200MP camera with 100x Space Zoom captures stunning details from any distance. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, it handles multitasking, gaming, and AI features with ease.

specifications.Colors: Titanium Gray, Titanium Black, Titanium Violet, Titanium Yellow

features: Built-in S Pen with AI features
Galaxy AI - real-time translation, photo editing
Quad HD+ resolution with Vision Booster
Armor Aluminum frame with Gorilla Glass Victus 2

products.name: Google Pixel 8 Pro
products.fullDescription: Experience the future of smartphones with Google Pixel 8 Pro. Powered by Google Tensor G3, it brings advanced AI capabilities to everything you do. The camera system uses computational photography to capture perfect shots in any lighting. With pure Android and guaranteed updates, you'll always have the latest features.

specifications.Camera: 50MP Main + 48MP Ultra Wide + 48MP Telephoto with 5x optical zoom

features: Magic Eraser - remove unwanted objects from photos
Best Take - combine faces from multiple shots
Call Screen - AI assistant answers calls
